resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81861</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Interactive Quiz - Final Accounts</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario interactivo – Cuentas finales</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist Idirghníomhach – Cuntais Dheiridh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktiver Quiz - Schlußrechnungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu Interactif - Comptes Finals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Interativo - Clientes Finais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Interattivo - Clienti Finali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός διαγωνισμός γνώσεων - τελικοί απολογισμοί</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students can test their understanding of where items are listed in the Final Accounts.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes pueden comprobar su comprensión del lugar donde se listan los elementos en las cuentas finales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Féadfaidh daltaí a dtuiscint ar an áit a liostaítear nithe sna Cuntais Dheiridh a thástáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéir Ghnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können prüfen ihr Verständnis 
von, dem Einzelteile in den Schlußrechnungen ausgedruckt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent tester leur arrangement 
d'où des éléments sont énumérés dans les comptes finals.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem testar sua compreensão de 
onde os artigos são alistados nos clientes finais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi possono verificare la loro 
comprensione di dove gli articoli sono elencati nei clienti finali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να εξετάσουν την κατανόηση όπου
τους τα αντικείμενα παρατίθενται στους τελικούς απολογισμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10501</entry>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>

        <classification>
